result.purpose: Responsible for defining data models related to application versions, operators, history tracking, mandatory updates, and notifications.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related data models into separate files for clarity and maintainability.

internal/domains/manager/models/app_vers.purpose: Defines a VersionEntity struct for managing application version data.

internal/domains/manager/models/auth.go.purpose: Defines the OperatorEntity struct for managing operator data in the application.

internal/domains/manager/models/generic..purpose: Defines a HistoryEntity struct for tracking changes made by operators.

internal/domains/manager/models/mandator.purpose: Defines a data model for mandatory updates in the application.

internal/domains/manager/models/noti.go.purpose: Defines data models for notifications and related entities.
